descriptionMdByRank.1: Increases Energy Regen by **12.8%**. When Resonance Skill is released, increases ATK by **6%**, stacking up to 2 time(s). This effect lasts for 10s.
descriptionMdByRank.2: Increases Energy Regen by **16%**. When Resonance Skill is released, increases ATK by **7.5%**, stacking up to 2 time(s). This effect lasts for 10s.
descriptionMdByRank.3: Increases Energy Regen by **19.2%**. When Resonance Skill is released, increases ATK by **9%**, stacking up to 2 time(s). This effect lasts for 10s.
descriptionMdByRank.4: Increases Energy Regen by **22.4%**. When Resonance Skill is released, increases ATK by **10.5%**, stacking up to 2 time(s). This effect lasts for 10s.
descriptionMdByRank.5: Increases Energy Regen by **25.6%**. When Resonance Skill is released, increases ATK by **12%**, stacking up to 2 time(s). This effect lasts for 10s.
